channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US and China Meet for First Time Since Trump Imposed Tariffs
item.description: The outcome of the trade negotiations could determine the trajectory of the global economy.

item.title: Chinese Factories Are Moving Manufacturing to Vietnam to Escape Trumps Tariffs
item.description: A movement of manufacturing to Vietnam that began in President Trump’s first term is accelerating as sky-high U.S. tariffs block Chinese exports.

item.title: How Macron Became a Close Zelensky Ally
item.description: The French and Ukrainian presidents have a particular bond, built on a common goal of protecting Ukraine and deflecting Russia.

item.title: This Is the Trade Conflict Xi Jinping Has Been Waiting For
item.description: For years, the leader of China has planned to make the world dependent on its exports and know-how. But the strategy has costs for his own country.

item.title: With US Trade Deal, UK Steel Industry Feels Some Much Needed Relief
item.description: The agreement to lift the 25 percent duty on steel exported to the United States provided some relief for struggling businesses, but uncertainties for...

item.title: The threat to kick China out of U.S. exchanges is growing, and Hong Kong stands to benefit
item.description: Delisting worries have grown since late February, when President Donald Trump revived the threat of kicking Chinese companies off U.S. exchanges.

item.title: Clues into Gen Z parenting styles can be found in their approach to these two powerful elements
item.description: Here's what we can gather from how the newest generation of parents are raising their kids.

item.title: Billionaires’ Battle Over a Sculpture Exposes a Mysterious Art Market
item.description: David Geffen and Justin Sun’s unusually public dispute over ownership of a Giacometti sculpture valued at tens of millions of dollars gives a glimpse ...

item.title: How Macron Became a Close Zelensky Ally
item.description: The French and Ukrainian presidents have a particular bond, built on a common goal of protecting Ukraine and deflecting Russia.

item.title: This Is the Trade Conflict Xi Jinping Has Been Waiting For
item.description: For years, the leader of China has planned to make the world dependent on its exports and know-how. But the strategy has costs for his own country.

item.title: In Pope Leo, Some in MAGA Movement See an Antagonist
item.description: While President Trump welcomed the U.S.-born cardinal as the new pope, top Trump allies criticized Leo XIV for his similarities to Pope Francis.

item.title: What We Know About the Terrorist Groups India Said It Targeted
item.description: India has accused Pakistan of continuing to support Lashkar-e-Taiba and Jaish-e-Muhammad. Pakistan has rejected those claims.

item.title: ICE agents arrest Newark Mayor Ras Baraka at detention center protest
item.description: Witnesses said the arrest came after Baraka attempted to join three members of New Jersey’s congressional delegation, Reps. Robert Menendez, LaMonica ...

item.title: Stock markets stagnate as investors wait for Bessent’s trade talks with China
item.description: “Many Trade Deals in the hopper, all good (GREAT!) ones!,” President Donald Trump posted Friday on his social media app Truth Social.

item.title: Bessent says debt limit measures could run out in August
item.description: Bessent urged Congress to “increase or suspend the debt limit by mid-July, before its scheduled break, to protect the full faith and credit of the Uni...
